additional_data.description: The spirit of a demon who works for Shuten Doji. Crass and quick to anger. At heart, however, she's very much a naive and innocent girl. When facing someone of the opposite sex her hearts starts to race, her face turns completely pale, and she starts to blush. But there is an explanation behind these outward changes: her heart races out of excitement for the coming fight; her white face signals a trance-like state of focus, and the blushing is caused by increased blood flow due to a rush of adrenaline. For her, encountering someone of the opposite sex is no different than being on the battlefield...but there's no equally sound explanation for why she's so crass.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 17/05/17- 07/06/17
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 04/06/17 - 07/06/17
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increases the Skill DMG of all allies by 33% during the "Romance of the Demon and Sword" event.
◦ The effect increases with the number of limit breaks. (33% → 49.75% → 66.5% → 83.25% → 100%)
◦ Summon rate increased until 17/05/17- 07/06/17

main: "You sure know how to get a girl's heart beating!"
summon: "I am Torakuma Doji, one of Shuten Doji's Four Great Demon Generals!"
limit_break: "Now you've really got my blood pumping!"
